title: I am unable to select champions unless they are free week.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I am unable to play or view owned champions that i have bought both in a bundle and individually. This has been a problem ever since attending a league unlocked event 24 hours ago.

replies.body:
Oh snap that's not good O_O! I've looked over your account and it looks like something went wrong after that tournament and everything was wiped instead of being reset. 

If you can, reach out to them to get this fixed since this took place at their event. If they're unwilling to help you at all, save all the conversations you have with them and shoot them our way in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Once we can see that they're unwilling to right this wrong, we can step in and make everything right ^_^!

Is there no other way? I will not be able to get a hold of them for a week. Im also not sure how would they "right the wrong". Like are they going to have to reimburse me or something? Also the only way I know how to get ahold of them is in person and it's a 40 min drive that I don't want to drive there and back just to fix my account. 

On a side note, is there some chance this could happen again if I go to another unlocked event?
Try your best to contact them if at all possible, but I did see that you've already sent us a ticket earlier today. I've got an agent about to respond, so be checking your email for it!
Sorry for asking, what is the normal wait time for a response on a ticket? I just really want to be able to hop into ranked.

No worries, typically it can take anywhere from a couple hours to a day or so depending on the current size of their ticket queues. For instance, when we recently had that effed up patcher loop issue, those tickets queue got hella spiked o_o....
Thank you so much for helping me get this problem resolved! Your the real hero Broporo. I got everything back.

Ok, thanks for the info. I guess I have to wait a while cause of that. Could I possibly know is this something that could very well happen again to my account if I go to another League Unlocked events or is this just a really weird case? If it's something weird with my account then I can just stop going to those event instead of risking being unable to play for half a week+
Is there any fix or am i out 40 bucks? I'm on mac os 10.12.4
